categories: Category:Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Rino Romano (born December 1[source?], 1969) is a Italian-Canadian voice actor whose most well known roles are those of Bruce Wayne/Batman in The Batman, opposite Kevin Michael Richardson, Darien Shields/Tuxedo Mask in the early episodes of the DiC dubbed anime Sailor Moon and Lone Starr in Spaceballs: The Animated Series. In the Star Wars universe, he provided the voices of Kyle Katarn in Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith and the male Revan (taunts and replies in player's commands) in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. He also voiced Firith Me.
